Title: Scream
Overview: A year after the murder of her mother, Sidney Prescott is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends by using scary movies as part of a deadly game.
Tagline: Someone has taken their love of scary movies one step too far.
Keywords: halloween, gore, serial killer, slasher, tabloid, news reporter, self-referential, meta film
Cast: David Arquette, Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox
